text: @LiberalerLeidenschaftlich🚨 European Energy Prices in Crisis 🌎 Ukraine's Infrastructure Under Attack! 💥 What does this mean for the future of sustainable energy solutions? 🔍 Andriy Kobolyev, former CEO of Naftogaz, sheds light on the issue. 💡 Diversifying energy sources is crucial in today's geopolitical climate. 🌍 Military assistance is needed NOW to secure Ukraine's energy infrastructure! 💪
